name: Gnome More
description:
Made for the SoloDevelopment 2023 72 hour game jam! Using the prompt "The end is near".

The gnome purge is happening today, it is well known that the end is near for many a gnome's life. You, however, are part of a dwindling population of gnome supporters, and have decided to stay out of the way and do some extra overtime at your workplace.

Gnomes start appearing out of vents at your office seeking refuge during the purge. Your job is to find hiding places for them and keep them out of the way of your boss for however long the purge lasts. Do not let too many be killed,  you do not want to know what your boss will do to you if he figures out you're trying to hide gnomes.

Controls:

WASD - moving

E - pick up and put down gnomes (Can also put them in some cabinets)

F - kick gnomes

Made by:

  • Richard Belovic - code guy
  • Angus Jardine - art guy

Thank you, William Schofield, Matthew Warwick, and Elijah Servi for supplying us with some amazing gnome sound effects. And William Schofield for also voicing the news reporter.
